item.title: tales for the l33t
item.description: I wa5 ch1ll1ng 0n th3 w3b, and 1 f0und th1s gr3at flash m0vie. it 1s a r3mak1ng 0f th3 t1m3le55 cla551c “R0m30 and J00liet.” Watch 1t. N0w!! or y0u will b3 fuxored…
